mapper.select: select member.no, member.name, member.hp, period, approval, deadline, locker_no lockerNo, trainer.name tName, pt_total ptTotal, pt_count ptCount from member, general, pt, trainer where member.no = general.no and member.no = pt.no and (member.no, deadline) in (select no, max(deadline) from general group by no) and pt.trainer_no = trainer.trainer_no order by deadline desc;

select m.no, m.name, m.hp, m.period, m.approval, g.deadline, m.locker_no, g.pt_total ptTotal, g.pt_count ptCount, g.tname from member m left outer join (select member.no, member.name, member.hp, period, approval, deadline, locker_no, trainer.name tname, pt_total, pt_count from member, general, pt, trainer where member.no = general.no and member.no = pt.no and (member.no, deadline) in (select no, max(deadline) from general group by no) and pt.trainer_no = trainer.trainer_no and member.name like concat('%', #{keyword},'%')) g on m.no = g.no order by deadline desc limit #{startRowNo},#{listCnt}
select count(*) from member where member.name like concat('%', #{keyword},'%')
select name, id, hp, address, gender, approval, locker_no lockerNo from member where no = #{no}
select reg_date regDate, deadline, price from general where no = 4 order by deadline desc limit 1;
select pt_count ptCount, pt_total ptTotal from pt where no = #{no}
select entry_time entryTime, leave_time leaveTime from attend where no = 1 order by leave_time desc;
select comment, l_date lDate from lesson, pt where pt.pt_no = lesson.pt_no and no = 1;
select reg_date regDate, deadline, price from general where no = 4 order by deadline desc;
